name: Loft Pals Urbanstay Lodge, Kapit
features: Located in Kapit, Loft Pals Urbanstay Lodge, Kapit has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The inn has family rooms. At the inn, the rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Sibu Airport is 89 miles from the property.
address: Lot 88, Kapit Town District, 96000 Kapit, Malaysia

name: T Lodge, Kapit
features: Located in Kapit, T Lodge, Kapit provides accommodations with free WiFi and a restaurant. The lodge offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and bath or shower. Sibu Airport is 89 miles away.
address: 28 Jalan Teo Chow Beng, 96800 Kapit, Malaysia

name: Dung Fang Hotel
features: Dung Fang Hotel is offering accommodations in Kapit. The property has room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Dung Fang Hotel, the rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom. Sibu Airport is 89 miles from the property.
address: 116, Lot 510, Jalan Temenggong Jugah, 96800 Kapit, Sarawak, Malaysia
